title: Mobile Wordpress Website
snippet:
Seeking development of mobile website using wordpress.  This site should be optimized for mobile on a small screen, especially well suited for iOS and Android.  It should have seamless navigation menu with mouse-over actions.  It includes banners (provided by me) and several ad images (provided by me).  I have text and basic instructions for placement.  Project includes design and upload to deliver a functional mobile website.

SEO:  including meta tags for SEO, both google and social media, also google analytics and adwords.  

FORMS: Should include Contact, Mailing list and email submission form with attachment feature.  Also include setup for form collection via mailchimp.

VIDEO: 3 Videos (provided by me) for single loop placing.  Text overlay provided.

CHAT: Wordpress chat plug-in, and other plug-in's you'd recommend

NAVIGATION:
